level.heading: FLOOR-AREA-RATIO (FAR), HEIGHT, LOT OCCUPANCY, REAR YARD SETBACK, MINIMUM LOTREA, AND SETBACKS (§ 11-3306) The StE District is divided into the StE-1 through StE-19 Districts for theurpose of floor area ratio (FAR), lot occupancy, and building height. Except as provided in this section, the FAR, height of a building or structure ,ot occupancy and rear yard in a StE District shall not exceed or be less thanhat set forth in the following table: Zone District FAR (Max.) FAR – Required Residential (Min.) FAR – Above Grade Parking (Max.) Height (Max. Ft.) Lot Occupancy (Max. %) Rear Yard (Min. Ft.) StE-1

level.text: In addition to the FAR permitted by § 3306.2, additional FAR for above gradearking is permitted as follows:
Within the StE-15 subdistrict – 1.0 FAR; and
Any of the FAR permitted under § 3306.3(a) that is not used for above gradearking may be utilized for any other use permitted within that zone;
Any above-grade parking shall conform to the standards of § 3309; and
This density may not be transferred through the Combined Lot Provisions of §307 to another parcel.
Maximum permitted height within the StE-7 subdistrict is as follows:
For a distance of two-hundred fifty feet (250 ft.) measured from the northroperty line bounding Cypress Street, the maximum permitted height shall beighty feet (80 ft.); and
For the remainder of this parcel, the maximum permitted height shall be fiftyeet (50 ft.).
The height and FAR limits of §3306.2 shall serve as the maximums permittednder a planned unit development (PUD).
The minimum lot area for row dwellings in any StE District shall be one thousandight hundred square feet (1,800 s.f.) with a minimum lot width of eighteen feet18 ft.).

No part of a building within the StE-6, StE-13, and StE-16 subdistricts shallroject above a plane drawn at a forty-five degree (450) angle from a lineocated seventy-five feet (75 ft.) directly above the eastern property line thatbuts the ravine.
Buildings within the StE-17 and StE-18 subdistricts shall be set back not lesshan ten feet (10 ft.) from the property line that abuts Alabama Avenue and 13thtreet.

No part of a building within the StE-17 and StE-18 subdistricts shall projectbove a plane drawn at a forty-five degree (450) angle from a line located fiftyeet (50 ft.) directly above the property line that abuts Alabama Avenue.

level.heading: FAR for structured parking located above grade is regulated as follows
